          <title>
            <string language="en">Arrangement of particles in the three states of matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung für Partikel in den drei Zuständen 
des Stoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agencement des particules dans les trois états

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arranjo das partículas nos três estados da

            <string language="x-mt-it">La disposizione delle particelle nei tre

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the different arrangement of particles for each state of matter.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre l'agencement différent des

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra el diverso arreglo de las
